explains: vt. 逐出，驱逐；使……移动；用力移动
vi. 驱逐，逐出；离开原位

sentences.en: Congress had sought to dislodge him from the post.
sentences.cn: 国会曾试图解除他的职务。

sentences.en: The rebels have so far failed to dislodge the President.
sentences.cn: 叛乱分子至今未能把总统赶下台。

sentences.en: The thorn of bone may dislodge from his throat without surgery.
sentences.cn: 也许不用动手术就能去除他喉咙卡着的那块骨刺。
